Question: This person's "Help!" expressed his own feelings in 1965: "I meant it ..
Hints: After her sister, Mimi Smith, twice complained to Liverpool's Social Services, Julia handed the care of this person over to her.
Although the exhibition had not yet begun, this person wanted to hammer a nail into the clean board, but Ono stopped him.
She agreed to allow the pregnancy to continue on condition that this person adopt the role of househusband; this he agreed to do.
